posts.post_title: FS T206 Chase Trophy and T207 Johnson
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have the following cards for sale:

T206 Chase, holding trophy ungraded, no creases or paper loss. Nice! $85.00

T207 Walter Johnson, SGC30. Creases. $300.00

Price includes delivery. Paypal, check or money order. First email that says I'll take them--gets them.

Thanks,

Joe
